posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott Sarian
Hello,

I have a 1910-12 Sweet Caporal P2 pin of Fred Clarke (small letters) PSA 6 for sale. The front is gorgeous and should grade higher, and the paper on the back is intact but off-center (causing the PSA 6 grade).

New price - $60 delivered

Email to scooter0729@yahoo.com if interested or with any questions.

Thanks!

Scott
